name: Shadowdrake
habitat: The Dark Mountains beyond the eastern reaches
appearance: A massive dragon with scales of deep obsidian that shimmer with dark purple undertones. Two pairs of enormous leathery wings and eyes that glow like molten crimson. Smoke curls from its nostrils.
abilities: Breath weapon - streams of shadow fire
significance: Considered a myth by most, the Shadowdrake is said to be a guardian of ancient and forbidden knowledge. Its mere presence corrupts the land around it, and legend says it feeds on the essence of broken oaths and shattered hopes.
